request.description:
Upload a file to the server. Supported categories: profile_avatar, product_image, product_gallery, banner_image, delivery_point, brand_logo, category_image, document_upload, chat_attachment, review, temp_upload, other.

Note: You need to select a file in the 'file' field before sending this request.
